message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think this is the highest I can go.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above your offer. I'm willing to compromise and meet you in the middle. I'll sell the product to you for $1350000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above your new offer. I'm willing to go up to $1250000, but no higher. I think this is a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to meet you here.

I understand that you're willing to go up to $1250000, but I'm still not willing to let go of the product at that price. I'll meet you halfway again, and I'll sell the product to you for $1300000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still not willing to go above $1250000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: $1240000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
